" No way fuckwheat," Hell Drak stuttered, scared out of her sputnick whits.=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
  To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, September 14, 2001 7:24 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


  OOC: Nooooooo! Not the shits!

  BIC: Sh=
okaract did not know he had those deadly shits. He raised his cannon and fi=
red 3 more shits at Hell Drak! They were about to collide with Hell Drak's =
shits, when suddenly, the rule of no interception came into play! The disks=
 sliced into Shokaract, spilling mech fluid all around!

  Shokaract: Ahh! =
Moder!...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Testifier: Abyssian =
Badass 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, September 14, 200=
1 4:06 PM
    Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


    "You spudnick, you=
!  Damn you, spuckley!" Hell Drak yelled, avoiding some of the shits, but g=
etting hit by some of the others.

    She fired back two sputnick lazer di=
scuses.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Roland the Last Gun=
slinger 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, September =
13, 2001 11:52 PM
      Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


      OOC: A=
s tempted as I am, I cannot let my characters just explode. I need to keep =
repeating that to myself.

      BIC: Shokaract didn't expect the disks, an=
d one hit him almost harmlessly, but the other sliced into him. Green goo s=
prayed from a crevice in his side. However, he was silent about it. He aime=
d the gattling gun at Hell Drak and fired 3 laser bolts from it, then raise=
d his tiny hot dog gun and fired 4 shots from it, also aimed at Hell Drak..=
.

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Testifier: Abyssian =
Badass 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, Septemb=
er 13, 2001 7:28 AM
        Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


        =
"No way, bitchwheat!" Hell Drak yelled, rolling and firing two lazer discs =
at Shokaract.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Rolan=
d the Last Gunslinger 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent=
: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 11:52 PM
          Subject: Re: Attack!/Ori=
on/Shokaract


          It hit Shokaract. EXPLODE! Somehow, the language w=
oke Shokaract from his trance, not the missile. He transformed into robot m=
ode and beckoned Hell Drak to come closer with a movement of his hand...

 =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Testifier: Abyss=
ian Badass 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wedne=
sday, September 12, 2001 11:19 PM
            Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Sh=
okaract


            Hell Drak avoided the missile.

            "Not this=
 time, fucko!" Hell Drak yelled, firing a lazer back at Shokaract.
        =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Roland the Last Gun=
slinger 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Wedn=
esday, September 12, 2001 9:53 PM
              Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/=
Shokaract


              The lasers his Shokaract all 4 times, but he didn=
't seem to notice, he was fixated on some thing only he could see, somethin=
g from his own mind. Ahh! PSYCHO! Shokaract fires a single missile back at =
Hell Drak...

                ----- Original Message ----- 
               =
 From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
                Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 9:29 PM
           =
     Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


                ::Headshot/Hell=
 Drak/Triggerhappy::

                Headshot ducked by a tree.  One of Or=
ion's shots nailed him in the side.

                "Ah, f***!!!!!!!" Head=
shot yelled, holding his side in pain, getting up from being knocked down.
=

                Headshot climbed up into the tree, and fired a sniper shot=
 at Orion.  Headshot was standing up, so, if he was hit......(hint hint!)
 =
               ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                Hell Drak was hit by the two=
 missiles.  She went flying back into a wall.  Hell Drak fired 4 lazers at =
Shokaract.
                ~~~~~~~~
                Triggerhappy flew out o=
f the way of Orion's shots.  Triggerhappy flew down, attempting to ram righ=
t into Orion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

se of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

ce.
